mapper.update:
update tbl_activity
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id,owntbl.name as owner, a.name,a.start_date,a.end_date,a.cost,a.description, a.create_time,cretbl.name as create_by,a.edit_time,edittbl.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a join tbl_user owntbl on a.owner = owntbl.id join tbl_user cretbl on a.create_by = cretbl.id left join tbl_user edittbl on a.edit_by = edittbl.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity a set a.owner = #{activity.owner}, a.name = #{activity.name}, a.cost = #{activity.cost}, a.start_date = #{activity.startDate}, a.end_date = #{activity.endDate}, a.description = #{activity.description}, a.edit_time = #{activity.editTime}, a.edit_by = #{activity.editBy} where id = #{activity.id}

insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, start_date,end_date, cost, description,create_time, create_by) values
(#{act.id},#{act.owner},#{act.name},#{act.startDate},#{act.endDate}, #{act.cost},#{act.description},#{act.createTime},#{act.createBy})

#{id}

select a.id,owntbl.name as owner, a.name,a.start_date,a.end_date,a.cost,a.description, a.create_time,cretbl.name as create_by,a.edit_time,edittbl.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a join tbl_user owntbl on a.owner = owntbl.id join tbl_user cretbl on a.create_by = cretbl.id left join tbl_user edittbl on a.edit_by = edittbl.id where a.id not in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )

select a.id,owntbl.name as owner, a.name,a.start_date,a.end_date,a.cost,a.description, a.create_time,cretbl.name as create_by,a.edit_time,edittbl.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a join tbl_user owntbl on a.owner = owntbl.id join tbl_user cretbl on a.create_by = cretbl.id left join tbl_user edittbl on a.edit_by = edittbl.id where a.id in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )
select from tbl_activity where id in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )
